Package tage

Class RenderQueue

java.lang.Object
tage.RenderQueue
public class RenderQueue extends Object
Builds a render queue by traversing the GameObjects as specified in the scenegraph tree. After building the queue as a Vector, it makes available an iterator for the queue. It is used by the engine before rendering each frame, and none of the functions should be called directly by the game application.

Transparent objects are stored in a seperate queue, added to the end of the queue once all objects have been added.
